overview:
Accomplished senior designer with over a decade of unique experience in the entertainment industry as well as a wide variety of projects showcasing a strong and diverse portfolio.

Established Prince as a pioneer in the online music world by building his award-winning online entertainment business working directly with the artist to fully articulate his vision of how to connect his fans to his music. Grew his business into a multi-million dollar company and grew his online fanbase exponentially years before any other artist. Expanded the web presence of the band Pearl Jam, mobilized their online fanbase, and established a broader social network presence building up to their album reaching the top of the Billboard chart upon release.

Combined a strong fine arts background with cutting edge design software to develop creative expertise and an exceptional grasp of using computers as a design tool. Has flourished creating dozens of websites and internationally distributed books, DVDs, and CDs. Including the Prince releases, Musicology and 3121.

degrees.subject: Art and Technology
degrees.institution: School of the Art Institute of Chicago
